transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Yes.
Executive: Yes. Pawan from IndiaMART at office ma'am. I'm the reporting manager of Karina ma'am. Ma'am are you driving the car right now?
Customer: No, I'm not driving driver is there.
Executive: Okay driver is there. Ma'am actually yesterday na Karina called you.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: But you shared the feedback of the conversation as not satisfied ma'am. So the concern was being open so I want you know
Customer: [inaudible] I was unwell and I was sleeping.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: So whatever talk I did I did it in sleep.
Executive: Oh my. So I'm sorry for that because Karina always like you know
Customer: You don't be sorry for that ma'am. Actually that that give me the hint for because right now na ma'am Karina told me that you are looking for that Flipkart and Amazon like that concept over IndiaMART also. So it will be hardly taking 15 minutes of mine or 10 minutes of mine. So ma'am when you will be reaching office?
Customer: Yeah.
Executive: Yeah.
Customer: No you can tell me now I can because it will take little time for me I'm somewhere out. I think I'll take around 45 minutes yeah so you can
Executive: Ma'am actually I want to show you because few of the clients from your location na Jamshedpur hai na ma'am. So few of the clients your top product I want to represent my screen and clear all the things because I want to because I am taking I have studied about your product line. So hardly it will be taking so I will be representing my because you deal in the corrugated box okay ma'am and you are the manufacturer of this particular so there are three four five
Customer: Yeah yeah.
Customer: [inaudible] actually I want to show you.
Customer: Yeah yeah and we have fully automatic machine also.
Executive: Yes automatic.
Executive: Yes.
Executive: So basically what what the thing is going on na ma'am you are giving up the quotation okay you are sharing up the quotation the what the buyer is doing they are taking your quotation as an advantage and moving to the another supplier who is being registered with IndiaMART okay. So what what you are suppose that you have given the quotation of 50000 rupees they are negotiating over your quotation you got my point. So what I want to tell you I want to show you your listing your visibility how many client are being registered in the TrustSeal service this is all thing these things and will will be closing up the concern which has been open. So I will be calling you after one hour okay ma'am you you reach office I will be calling you after one hour.
Customer: Okay.
Customer: I can open it my mobile if you want.
Executive: Uh mobile ma'am the screen will be too because I will be representing my screen na so it's okay it is fine for you then I can just sharing up. I'm just sharing up your Google Meet link over your registered email ID ma'am.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Uh I have just shared you over your registered email ID please check it out ma'am.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Uh wait a minute yeah.
Executive: Yeah the email email ID is IndiaMART pdpl@gmail.com okay ma'am.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Customer: I can open the IndiaMART app also na.
Executive: Uh you can open but I have shared you over your registered email ID that is only thing ma'am. Or I will be sharing you over WhatsApp I'm just sharing you wait a minute. What is your number?
Customer: WhatsApp will be better mobile.
Customer: Mobile number please. It is 93348 yeah yeah 4819200 okay fine. I just shared you hi over WhatsApp okay.
Executive: [inaudible]
Executive: I'm just sharing up the Google Meet link wait a minute one. And this is the Google Meet link okay you have to write you have to write hi over my that WhatsApp message then the link will be activated okay.
Customer: Oh sure.
Executive: Yes please. Uh my name is Pawan and you can save it number with yes okay fine. Yeah okay.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Okay fine. Uh now what you you click over that and it will be asking to join the meeting.
(silence)
The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain usne aapki call ko hold pe rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe.
Executive: [inaudible] okay.
The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line.
Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain usne aapki call ko hold pe rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe.

summary:
Concerns:

- Customer shared negative feedback on previous call.

- Wants to understand Flipkart and Amazon like concept.



Resolution:

- Executive apologized for the inconvenience.

- Executive shared Google Meet link on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call after one hour.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- feedback, google meet, whatsapp, listing, visibility
